algorithm_technique: Iterate through the string, identify words, and apply capitalization rules based on word length.
problem_summary_simple: Capitalize words in a title: lowercase for 1-2 letters, title case for 3+ letters.
problem_summary_technical: Process a string word by word, converting to lowercase and then applying title case based on word length.
key_insights: The problem requires processing words individually, separated by spaces.
A common approach is to convert the entire string to lowercase first, then selectively capitalize.
Careful handling of word boundaries (spaces) and the end of the string is needed.
